title: New: Various Cruelties – ‘Neon Truth/She Is The One'
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/various.jpg "various")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/6137-new-various-cruelties-neon-truthshe-is-the-one/attachment/various)

After **Crack In The Road** were the first blog to feature **Various Cruelties** (can you tell I’m proud of that?), the band have gone on to receive a great deal of attention from fans and critics alike, not to mention a fair amount of national radio play. After successfully releasing their debut single ‘**If It Wasn’t For You**‘ towards the end of last year, the band return with their sophomore effort ‘**Neon Truth**‘ and ‘**She Is The One**‘. A fantastic development in their sound, ‘**Neon Truth**‘ is an upbeat affair with jangly guitars and soaring vocals, whereas ‘**She Is The One**‘ is a much slower, and more soulful experience. A very promising release by a very promising band, and you will be able to buy the single from the **23rd May**.

 [NEON TRUTH](http://soundcloud.com/variouscruelties/neon-truth) by [variouscruelties](http://soundcloud.com/variouscruelties)
